title: Beads-Tasklets Integration: API Key Authentication
description:
## Overview
Bidirectional sync between Tasklets tickets and beads issues. Auto-sync on session start + on-demand command.

## Decisions Made

| Question | Decision |
|----------|----------|
| API key scope | Tenant-wide |
| Auto-create issues | Yes |
| Priority system | P0-P4 (direct mapping) |
| Sync trigger | Both: session start + on-demand |
| Duplicate prevention | Store beads_issue_id in ticket |
| Two-way sync | Yes - push/pull status, plans, notes |
| Type mapping | All tickets → bug (can promote to feature/epic) |

## Data Model Changes

### Tickets table - add columns:
- `beads_issue_id` - Link to beads issue (prevents duplicates)
- `priority` - Change from 1-5 to P0-P4 enum

### New api_keys table:
- id, tenant_id, key_hash, name, is_active, created_at, last_used_at

## Two-Way Sync Flow

```
PULL (Tasklets → Beads):
- New ticket → bd create --type=bug
- Ticket status change → bd update <id> --status=X
- Ticket priority change → bd update <id> --priority=X

PUSH (Beads → Tasklets):
- Issue status change → PATCH /api/external/tickets/:id
- Issue linked to epic/feature → update ticket metadata
- Bug promoted to feature → update ticket category
```

## API Endpoints

### External API (API key auth):
- `GET /api/external/tickets` - List tickets (with filters)
- `GET /api/external/tickets/:id` - Get single ticket
- `PATCH /api/external/tickets/:id` - Update ticket (status, beads_issue_id, etc.)
- `POST /api/external/tickets/:id/sync` - Trigger sync for specific ticket

## Beads Integration

### Hooks:
- `session-start` - Pull new/updated tickets, create/update issues
- Custom command: `bd sync-tickets` - Manual sync trigger

### Issue metadata:
- Description includes: `[Tasklets #123](http://localhost:4000/tickets/123)`
- Labels/tags for epic/feature association

## Files to Modify
- `apps/api/src/db/schema.ts` - api_keys table, ticket.beads_issue_id, priority enum
- `apps/api/src/middleware/apiKey.ts` - New API key auth middleware
- `apps/api/src/routes/external.ts` - External API routes
- `.beads/hooks/session-start.sh` - Sync hook
- `scripts/bd-sync-tickets.sh` - On-demand sync command

## Implementation Phases
1. Schema: api_keys table + ticket columns
2. API key middleware
3. External API endpoints (CRUD)
4. Beads hook (pull: Tasklets → Beads)
5. Push sync (Beads → Tasklets)
6. Testing & documentation

title: [CSUP-F024] Beads-Tasklets Integration: API Key Authentication
description:
## Overview
Bidirectional sync between Tasklets tickets and beads issues. Auto-sync on session start + on-demand command.

## Decisions Made

| Question | Decision |
|----------|----------|
| API key scope | Tenant-wide |
| Auto-create issues | Yes |
| Priority system | P0-P4 (direct mapping) |
| Sync trigger | Both: session start + on-demand |
| Duplicate prevention | Store beads_issue_id in ticket |
| Two-way sync | Yes - push/pull status, plans, notes |
| Type mapping | All tickets → bug (can promote to feature/epic) |

## Data Model Changes

### Tickets table - add columns:
- `beads_issue_id` - Link to beads issue (prevents duplicates)
- `priority` - Change from 1-5 to P0-P4 enum

### New api_keys table:
- id, tenant_id, key_hash, name, is_active, created_at, last_used_at

## Two-Way Sync Flow

```
PULL (Tasklets → Beads):
- New ticket → bd create --type=bug
- Ticket status change → bd update <id> --status=X
- Ticket priority change → bd update <id> --priority=X

PUSH (Beads → Tasklets):
- Issue status change → PATCH /api/external/tickets/:id
- Issue linked to epic/feature → update ticket metadata
- Bug promoted to feature → update ticket category
```

## API Endpoints

### External API (API key auth):
- `GET /api/external/tickets` - List tickets (with filters)
- `GET /api/external/tickets/:id` - Get single ticket
- `PATCH /api/external/tickets/:id` - Update ticket (status, beads_issue_id, etc.)
- `POST /api/external/tickets/:id/sync` - Trigger sync for specific ticket

## Beads Integration

### Hooks:
- `session-start` - Pull new/updated tickets, create/update issues
- Custom command: `bd sync-tickets` - Manual sync trigger

### Issue metadata:
- Description includes: `[Tasklets #123](http://localhost:4000/tickets/123)`
- Labels/tags for epic/feature association

## Files to Modify
- `apps/api/src/db/schema.ts` - api_keys table, ticket.beads_issue_id, priority enum
- `apps/api/src/middleware/apiKey.ts` - New API key auth middleware
- `apps/api/src/routes/external.ts` - External API routes
- `.beads/hooks/session-start.sh` - Sync hook
- `scripts/bd-sync-tickets.sh` - On-demand sync command

## Implementation Phases
1. Schema: api_keys table + ticket columns
2. API key middleware
3. External API endpoints (CRUD)
4. Beads hook (pull: Tasklets → Beads)
5. Push sync (Beads → Tasklets)
6. Testing & documentation
